channel.title: Beats From The East on CJLO
channel.description:
"Beats From The East" is a weekly radio broadcast on Concordia's CJLO 1690 am, a Montreal,Canada-based University Radio station.
Every Saturday night at 10pm EST, DJ Mister Vee will be bringing you some of the best urban music (Soul, RnB, Hip-Hop, Funk, Electro, Acid Jazz, Reggae...yes, Asian-Reggae exists!) from Far-East Asian artists. You can expect to hear music sung in English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, Korean, Tagalog, and Vietnamese.
For those of you who do not live in Montreal, the show will be offered to you via live webcast. You just need to visit www.cjlo.com and run the live stream.
If you've never heard of MC Sniper, Kero-One, Lyrics Born, Christina Chung, Paul Kim, Notorious MSG, Far-East Movement, Magnetic North, Roscoe Umali, Sevenes, Snacky Chan, UPT, Hiro-A-Key, The Greater Good, Masia One, or Anonymous Twist, then SCHOOL IS IN!!!
BIG UPS TO:
My content contributors/"talent scouts" : Eljay Lasangue, Chris Martinez, YJ Lin, Izeu Lim, Enny Tran, Ashley E, Masia One, Dave Chin, Sydney Auyeung, Vince Ng, and Lucy LBN
Korean-Title Translator : Ashley E
Pitch-Assistants/Proof-readers: Brian Hodge, Kala Julien
Angryasianman.com for their support! Be sure to check out their site for anything Asian-community and pop-culture related! Very informative and entertaining!
AND to the CJLO Management for seeing the need to have such a show on their station and allowing this to happen!
feedback and inquiries: bfte@cjlo.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Urban Music from Far-East Asian Communities Worldwide!
channel.itunes:author: Mister-Vee (DJ)
